SalesOrder.description: The Data object cannot be null and cannot be an empty object.

Website.description:
Maps to the field EcommerceWebsites.EcommerceWebsiteId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

CustomerGuid.description:
Maps to the field Customers.CustomerGUID in your WinMan database.
Null values: allowed if both CustomerId and CustomerBranch are not null or empty.
Empty strings: allowed if both CustomerId and CustomerBranch are not null or empty.

CustomerId.description:
Maps to the field Customers.CustomerId in your WinMan database.
Null values: allowed if CustomerGuid is not null or empty
Empty strings: allowed if CustomerGuid is not null or empty

CustomerBranch.description:
Maps to the field Customers.Branch in your WinMan database.
Null values: allowed if CustomerGuid is not null or empty
Empty strings: allowed if CustomerGuid is not null or empty

TotalOrderValue.description:
The total order value after discounts are applied, including tax, including delivery.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: not allowed

EffectiveDate.description:
Maps to the field SalesOrders.EffectiveDate in your WinMan database.
Null values: allowed
Empty strings: allowed

CustomerOrderNumber.description:
Maps to the field SalesOrders.CustomerOrderNumber in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

CurrencyCode.description:
Maps to the field Currencies.CurrencyId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

WebsiteUserName.description:
Maps to the field CRMContacts.PortalUserName in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed
